resources.string: Touch the program button to select a recently used program, edit your preferred date/time to launch, and execute by pressing the Create Automation Entry button.

Touch the program button to select from a list of your automated entries. Once selected, edit your preferred day to launch by pressing the Day button, or press the Time button to edit your preferred time. Press the Update button after changing day/time to update your entry. You can remove the entry selected by pressing the Disable button.

Pepper is an automatic task launching system. Use the recent tasks tab to create a task to launch, and use the Scheduled tasks tab to manage your automated tasks.

Credits:
